price: 18. Ese día el cielo se resquebrajará, y la promesa de Al-lah se cumplirá sin duda alguna.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
